", " + x + " " + text : ""); function DRPricing(props) { const [show, setShow] = React.useState(false); const [plan, setPlan] = React.useState(""); const openControls = (name) => {setShow(true); setPlan(name); window.scrollTo(0, document.getElementById("collapse-1").offsetTop - 100);}; const [value, setValue] = React.useState(1); const handleChange = value => setValue(value); const [veeam, setVeeam] = React.useState(0); const [IP,setIP] = React.useState(0); return (
